even though it doesn't work for windows yet, when it does there are several 
free compilers you could download, if you want.  Otherwise I'm sure somebody 
will build it for you :)

On Thursday 26 September 2002 11:56, you wrote:
> <PRE>Since I don't have a compiler on my system and I reallly want to play
> the new version of Gladiator, is there a chance that somebody will compile
> it for Windows and place on Yahoo or snowstorm or anywhere?  Thanks in
> advance.
